title: Chinese Threat Actors Exploit ToolShell SharePoint Flaw Weeks After Microsoft's July Patch
description: Threat actors with ties to China exploited the ToolShell security vulnerability in Microsoft SharePoint to breach a telecommunications company in the Middle East after it was publicly disclosed and patched in July 2025. Also targeted were government departments in an African country, as well as government agencies in South America, a university in the U.S., as well as likely a state technology
